text: @SenSchumer It appears Chuck Schumer may have wanted to see the coronavirus hit our country. Hiding the truth about wanting to keep travel coming in from the country where it's been spreading unchecked increases the likelihood of you working against American interests. https://t.co/SWpjyNwpVU

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
